TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FileDialogCustomPlacesCollection extends System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<class System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCustomPlace>
Public Class FileDialogCustomPlacesCollection Inherits Collection(Of FileDialogCustomPlace)

summary.span: 表示 类的 Windows Vista 自定义区域的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of Windows Vista custom places for the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] 或上 [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)] ，此类不起任何作用。On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)], this class does not have any effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the . 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体中，并 `InitializeDialogAndButton` 从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理方法调用。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call `InitializeDialogAndButton` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

span.span: A that represents a [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder.

summary.span: 将一个自定义空间添加到 集合。

span.span: Adds a custom place to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文件夹只会添加到特定的位置 ，而不是系统或应用程序的范围更改。The folder is added to custom places only for a particular and is not a system or application wide change. 文件夹按其添加到的顺序放置在自定义位置中 。The folders are positioned in the custom places in the order that they are added to the . 最后添加的项将位于顶部。The last one added will be at the top. 如果将自定义位置添加到运行应用程序的计算机上不存在的集合，则不会显示自定义位置。If you add a custom place to the collection that does not exist on the computer running the application, the custom place will not be shown. Guid 不区分大小写。GUIDs are case-insensitive. 有关可用已知文件夹的列表 [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] ，请参阅 [文件对话框自定义位置的已知文件夹 guid](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/known-folder-guids-for-file-dialog-custom-places) 或 Windows SDK 中的 knownfolders.h 文件。For a list of the available [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folders, see [Known Folder GUIDs for File Dialog Custom Places](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/known-folder-guids-for-file-dialog-custom-places) or the KnownFolders.h file in the Windows SDK. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体中，并 `InitializeDialogAndButton` 从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理方法调用。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call `InitializeDialogAndButton` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/VB/Form1.vb#1)]
